Kyle I'll ask you one thing.What's the point of having a contest???

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> (mindless rant in 3....2...1...) DID YOU NOT READ IT
> OR ARE YOU JUST TO STUPID TO UNDERSTAND IT!  GOOD
> RPING WOULD EARN MORE POINTS THAN WINNING BATTLES (I
> noted making a char successfully act messed up in da'
> head would get more points than winning a fight)
> WINNING BATTLES WOULDN'T GET YOU NEARLY AS MANY POINTS
> YOU MORON!
> 
> --- Rudra656@a... wrote:
> > a) impractical
> > b) unfair
> > 
> > It's not as simple as scoring a fight, for one thing
> > someone would have to 
> > keep track of it and that person would have to be
> > impartial.  No one here is 
> > impartial.
> > 
> > It's unfair because there's more to RP'ing than just
> > fighting.  In fact one 
> > of the biggest complaints before the restart was
> > that there were too many 
> > pointless battles.  To make it all about fighting
> > would be a mistake.
> > 
> > Now if you want to fix these problems and resubmit
> > your idea to the council, 
> > I suggest you send it to the council.  Your idea has
> > merit and might work if 
> > you can fix the flaws.
> > 
>
